member.name: M:SimpleApiProject.Controllers.AccountController.CreateAccount(SimpleApiProject.Dto.CreateAccDto)
member.summary: This end point creates an account
member.response: returns the account name, account number and balance

member.name: M:SimpleApiProject.Controllers.AccountController.Deposit(SimpleApiProject.Dto.DepositDto)
member.summary: This end point is there for users put money into their account to be able to perform transfers
member.response: returns the account name, account number and balance

member.name: M:SimpleApiProject.Controllers.AccountController.MakeTransfer(SimpleApiProject.Dto.TransferDto)
member.summary: This end point is used to transfer fund from one account to another
member.response: returns the account name, account number and balance

member.name: M:SimpleApiProject.Controllers.AccountController.GetAccBal(System.String)
member.summary: This end point is used to retrieve user's account balance
member.response: returns the account name, account number and balance

member.name: M:SimpleApiProject.Controllers.TransactionController.GetAllTransactions
member.summary: This end point returns all the transactions

member.name: M:SimpleApiProject.Controllers.TransactionController.GetTransaction(System.Guid)
member.summary: This end point returns all the transactions

member.name: M:SimpleApiProject.Controllers.TransactionController.DeleteTransaction(System.Guid)
member.summary: This end point returns all the transactions
